吃.definition: to eat; to consume; to eat at (a cafeteria etc); to eradicate; to destroy; to absorb; to suffer (shock, injury, defeat etc)

吃一塹，長一智.pinyin: chī yī qiàn ， zhǎng yī zhì
吃一塹，長一智.definition: Fall into the moat and you'll be wiser next time (idiom); One only learns from one's mistakes.

吃不上.definition: unable to get anything to eat; to miss a meal

吃不下.definition: not feel like eating; be unable to eat any more

吃不了兜著走.pinyin: chī bù liǎo dōu zhù zǒu
吃不了兜著走.definition: lit. if you can't eat it all, you'll have to take it home (idiom); fig. you'll have to take the consequences

吃不住.definition: to be unable to bear or support

吃不來.definition: to be unaccustomed to certain food; to not be keen on certain food

吃不到葡萄說葡萄酸.pinyin: chī bú dào pú táo shuō pú táo suān
吃不到葡萄說葡萄酸.definition: sour grapes (set expr. based on Aesop); lit. to say grapes are sour when you can't eat them

吃不服.definition: not be accustomed to eating sth; not be used to certain food

吃不消.definition: to be unable to tolerate or endure; to find sth difficult to manage

吃不準.definition: to be unsure about a matter; to be uncertain; to be unable to make sense of sth

吃乾抹淨.definition: (idiom) to devour (food); (idiom) to shamelessly take advantage; to ruthlessly exploit

吃人不吐骨頭.pinyin: chī rén bù tǔ gǔ tóu

吃人家的嘴軟，拿人家的手短.pinyin: chī rén jiā de zuǐ ruǎn ， ná rén jiā de shǒu duǎn
吃人家的嘴軟，拿人家的手短.definition: lit. the mouth that has been fed by others is soft, the hand that has received doesn't reach (idiom); fig. one is partial to those from whom presents have been accepted

吃人血饅頭.definition: to take advantage of others' misfortune (idiom)

吃住.definition: food and lodging; to stay (at some place) and eat meals (there)

吃公糧.definition: to be on the government payroll

吃別人嚼過的饃不香.pinyin: chī bié rén jué guò de mó bù xiāng
吃別人嚼過的饃不香.definition: lit. bread previously chewed by someone has no flavor (idiom); fig. there's no joy in discovering something if someone else got there first

吃力.definition: to entail strenuous effort; to toil at a task; strenuous; laborious; strain

吃力不討好.definition: arduous and thankless task (idiom); strenuous and unrewarding

吃吃.definition: (onom.) sound of muffled laughter (chuckling, tittering etc); sound of stammering

吃啞巴虧.definition: to be forced to suffer in silence; unable to speak of one's bitter suffering

吃喝.definition: to eat and drink; food and drink

吃喝嫖賭.definition: lit. to go dining, wining, whoring and gambling (idiom); fig. to lead a life of dissipation

吃喝拉撒睡.definition: to eat, drink, shit, piss, and sleep; (fig.) the ordinary daily routine

吃喝玩樂.definition: lit. to eat, drink, play and be merry (idiom); fig. to abandon oneself to a life of pleasure

吃回扣.definition: to receive a kickback; to draw a commission

吃土.definition: (neologism c. 2015) (slang) (used jokingly) to live on dirt (typically because one has spent all one's money on consumer items)

吃壞.definition: to upset (one's stomach) by eating bad food or overeating

吃大戶.definition: to plunder the homes of the wealthy for food (in times of famine); (of sb who has no income) to rely on others; to demand a "contribution" or "loan" from a business or wealthy individual

吃大虧.definition: to cost one dearly; to end disastrously; to pay bitterly

吃大鍋飯.definition: lit. to eat from the common pot (idiom); fig. to be rewarded the same, regardless of performance

吃官司.definition: to face legal action; to get sued

吃小竈.definition: to be given special treatment; to be treated in a favored way

吃屎都趕不上熱乎的.pinyin: chī shǐ dōu gǎn bù shàng rè hū de
吃屎都趕不上熱乎的.definition: lit. if you were eating warm shit, it'd be stone cold by the time you finished it (idiom); fig. (of a person) too slow; can't keep up

吃布.definition: to catch on cloth (e.g. of a zip fastener)

吃席.definition: to attend a banquet (funeral, wedding etc); (neologism c. 2020) (slang) (jocular) lit. to attend sb's funeral banquet (used to imply that things are going to go badly for sb)

吃得住.definition: to be able to bear; to be able to support

吃得消.definition: to be able to endure (exertion, fatigue etc); to be able to afford

吃得苦中苦，方為人上人.pinyin: chī dé kǔ zhōng kǔ ， fāng wèi rén shàng rén
吃得苦中苦，方為人上人.definition: one cannot achieve glory and wealth without having been through trials and tribulations (proverb); no pain, no gain

吃得開.definition: to be popular; to be getting on well; much in demand

吃拿卡要.definition: dinner invitations, grabbing, obstructing and demanding bribes; all kinds of abuse of power

吃播.definition: mukbang, genre of online broadcast consisting of the host eating food while interacting with their audience

吃案.definition: (Tw) (of the police) to bury a crime (i.e. conceal the existence of a criminal case in order to improve crime-solving statistics or in return for a bribe etc)

吃槍藥.definition: (lit.) to have swallowed gunpowder; (fig.) to be ablaze with anger; ornery; snappy

吃水.definition: drinking water; to obtain water (for daily needs); to absorb water; draft (of ship)

吃水不忘挖井人.pinyin: chī shuǐ bù wàng wā jǐng rén
吃水不忘挖井人.definition: see 吃水不忘掘井人[chi1 shui3 bu4 wang4 jue2 jing3 ren2]

吃水不忘掘井人.pinyin: chī shuǐ bù wàng jué jǐng rén
吃水不忘掘井人.definition: Drinking the water of a well, one should never forget who dug it. (idiom)

吃油.definition: (of food) to absorb oil; (of a vehicle) to guzzle fuel

吃法.definition: way of eating; how something is eaten; how a dish is prepared; the way a dish is to be cooked

吃熊心豹子膽.pinyin: chī xióng xīn bào zi dǎn
吃熊心豹子膽.definition: to eat bear heart and leopard gall (idiom); to pluck up some courage

吃瓜.definition: (neologism c. 2016) (slang) to watch an entertaining spectacle from the sidelines and-or engage in gossip about it

吃瓜群眾.definition: peanut gallery (esp. in online forums); onlookers who are interested in the spectacle but don't have anything knowledgeable to say about it; (neologism c. 2016)

吃白食.definition: to eat without paying; to freeload

吃白飯.definition: to eat plain rice; (fig.) to eat and not pay for it; to sponge off others; to freeload

吃皇糧.definition: lit. to eat from government coffers; to serve as a government employee; to live off government money

吃硬不吃軟.definition: susceptible to force but not persuasion

吃空額.definition: to embezzle by adding to the payroll employees existing in name only

吃空餉.definition: to embezzle by adding to the payroll employees existing in name only

吃糧不管事.definition: to eat without working (idiom); to take one's pay and not care about the rest

吃緊.definition: in short supply; dire; tense; critical; hard-pressed; important

吃膩.definition: to be sick of eating (sth); to be tired of eating (sth)

吃苦頭.definition: to suffer; to suffer for one's actions; to pay dearly; to burn one's fingers

吃著碗裡，看著鍋裡.pinyin: chī zhù wǎn lǐ ， kàn zhù guō lǐ
吃著碗裡，看著鍋裡.definition: lit. eyeing what's in the pot as one eats from one's bowl (idiom); not content with what one already has; (of men, typically) to have the wandering eye

吃著碗裡，瞧著鍋裡.pinyin: chī zhù wǎn lǐ ， qiáo zhù guō lǐ
吃著碗裡，瞧著鍋裡.definition: see 吃著碗裡，看著鍋裡|吃着碗里，看着锅里[chi1 zhe5 wan3 li3 , kan4 zhe5 guo1 li3]

吃藕.definition: (slang) unattractive; ugly (derived from near homophone 醜|丑[chou3])

吃虧.definition: to suffer losses; to come to grief; to lose out; to get the worst of it; to be at a disadvantage; unfortunately

吃螺絲.definition: (of an actor, announcer etc) to stumble over words (Tw)

吃裡爬外.definition: to work against the interests of sb one derives support from; to double-cross one's employer; to bite the hand that feeds you

吃請.definition: to be a guest at a dinner party; to be wined and dined (as a bribe)

吃豆腐.definition: to take liberties with (a woman); to tease with sexual innuendo; to sexually harass; to take advantage of sb

吃軟不吃硬.definition: lit. eats soft food, but refuses hard food (idiom); amenable to coaxing but not coercion

吃重.definition: (of a role) arduous; important; (a vehicle's) loading capacity

吃錯藥.definition: (lit.) to have taken the wrong medicine; (fig.) (of one's behavior etc) different than usual; abnormal

吃閉門羹.definition: to be refused entrance (idiom); to find the door closed

吃閒飯.definition: to lead an idle life; to be a loafer

吃雞.definition: (video games) PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds (PUBG); battle royale game; last-man-standing game; to play PUBG (or similar game); to win at PUBG (or similar game)

吃霸王餐.definition: to dine and dash; to leave without paying

吃青春飯.definition: to make the most of one's youthfulness in one's choice of employment (e.g. modeling)

吃飯.definition: to have a meal; to eat; to make a living

吃飯皇帝大.definition: eating comes first, then comes everything else (idiom) (Tw)

吃飽了飯撐的.pinyin: chī bǎo le fàn chēng de
吃飽了飯撐的.definition: having nothing better to do; see 吃飽撐著|吃饱撑着

吃館子.definition: to eat out; to eat at a restaurant

吃香喝辣.definition: lit. to eat delicious food and drink hard liquor (idiom); fig. to live well

吃驚.definition: to be startled; to be shocked; to be amazed

吃鴨蛋.definition: (fig.) to score 0 (on a test, in competition etc)

吃齋.definition: to abstain from eating meat; to be a vegetarian
